title: Fred Clarke and some dude named Howe McCormick - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: Fred Clarke and some dude named Howe McCormick - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hey, Fed Ex just got this to me today and I thought it was kinda cool.

Fred Clarke batting but it has some Howe McCormick (sp?  Gainesville?) backstamp on it.

Does anyone know any back story or whether there are more of these out there?

Anyway, I'm asking $6,500 obo.  Tell your friends.

SOLD SOLD SOLD!

---hint hint, someone tell Ed to make me an offer because it's his if he wants it......unless someone wants to pay me close to my asking....haha
Very cool of you. I am sure Ed will find you !!
Awesome Jeff!  Ed is going to be thrilled to add another HOFer to the collection.

posts.post_title: A lttile late to the party here,
posts.post_content:
but have now seen the post and responded to the message. Thanks for calling this out and passing on the offer.

Thanks again.

Ed
